meaningMnemonic: The <radical>thread</radical> you weave together to tell others about <radical>oneself</radical> is the <kanji>account</kanji> of your life. It's your very own <kanji>narrative</kanji>, tying everything you've been through together.
readingMnemonic: You take this <kanji>account</kanji> and lock it with a special <reading>key</reading> (き). You only give this key to people you really trust, so they can read the account of your life and truly understand you.
